author: BitterSweet#1337
description: Just a frontend of mpd for people so they can let people control your mpd, a totally great idea.
install_msg:
Thanks, for supporting my horrible idea that is oddly really cool.
`[p]help mpd` for commands.
short: Let people control other people's mpd clients
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
